http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif BEREAVEMENT-CARE List BEREAVEMENT-CARE List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=BEREAVEMENT-CARE&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=BEREAVEMENT-CARE.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2014-11-07T14:36:30Z Leanne.James 2014-11-07T14:26:17+00:00 2014-11-07T14:26:17+00:00 Research Lunchtime Seminar: Medical Detection Dogs - Developing new methodology to assist medics in the early diagnosis and management of human disease https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEREAVEMENT-CARE;5a54a362.1411 The Faculty of Health & Social Care at The Open University presents this free lunchtime seminar:<br><br>Medical Detection Dogs<br>Developing new methodology to assist medics in the early diagnosis and management of human disease<br><br>Dr Claire Guest, animal behaviourist and CEO of the Medical Detection Dogs charity presents an overview of their ground breaking research into the canine olfactory detection of metabolic disease and cancer in humans. [...] ROLLS, Liz 2014-06-03T18:09:57+00:00 2014-06-03T18:09:57+00:00 Re: Email from Colin may be a scam https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEREAVEMENT-CARE;972c1fc4.1406 Dear Colin<br>Good to hear the real you and know you are safe!<br><br>With best wishes<br><br>Liz<br><br>Dr. Elizabeth Rolls<br>Honorary Research Fellow, University of Gloucestershire<br><br>Address for correspondence:<br>Department of Natural and Social Sciences<br>University of Gloucestershire<br>Francis Close Hall, Swindon Road<br>Cheltenham<br>Glos GL50 4AZ<br>Tel: +44 (0)1242 237834 Colin Parkes 2014-06-03T14:04:53-04:00 2014-06-03T14:04:53-04:00 Re: Email from Colin may be a scam https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEREAVEMENT-CARE;47cb9f07.1406 Dear Liz,<br><br>Yes it was a scam. Now dealt with by AoL. Thanks for your concern,<br>Colin<br><br>-----Original Message-----<br>From: ROLLS, Liz <lrolls2@GLOS.AC.UK><br>To: BEREAVEMENT-CARE <BEREAVEMENT-CARE@JISCMAIL.AC.UK><br>Sent: Tue, 3 Jun 2014 13:49<br>Subject: Email from Colin may be a scam<br><br>Hello all<br>I have had emails like this before where there is a message from someone I know<br>in trouble - and its a scam, so careful!! [...] ROLLS, Liz 2014-06-03T12:36:52+00:00 2014-06-03T12:36:52+00:00 Email from Colin may be a scam https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEREAVEMENT-CARE;8317bfff.1406 Hello all<br>I have had emails like this before where there is a message from someone I know in trouble - and its a scam, so careful!!<br><br>With best wishes<br><br>Liz<br><br>Dr. Elizabeth Rolls<br>Honorary Research Fellow, University of Gloucestershire<br><br>Address for correspondence:<br>Department of Natural and Social Sciences<br>University of Gloucestershire<br>Francis Close Hall, Swindon Road<br>Cheltenham<br>Glos GL50 4AZ<br>Tel: +44 (0)1242 237834 Colin Parkes 2014-06-03T09:49:42+01:00 2014-06-03T09:49:42+01:00 Awful Trip (Colin Parkes) https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEREAVEMENT-CARE;25253404.1406 - This mail is in HTML. Some elements may be ommited in plain text. -<br><br>Good Morning,<br>I hope you get this on time!!!sorry to disturb you but i had to send this message to you due to an unforeseen circumstance that my family and i encountered.<br>My family and i traveled to Yalta (UKRAINE) for a short vacation but unfortunately for us, we had an accident of which i dislocated my right arm and my head got bruised. The driver of the cab passed on due to internal bleeding and the injuries he sustained on his head.I have not [...] Anne Barber 2014-05-19T22:18:47+01:00 2014-05-19T22:18:47+01:00 Child Funeral Charity - Seminar and launch https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BEREAVEMENT-CARE;4b5c6683.1405 Please find attached details of the Child Funeral Charity, a new charity<br>providing financial support for bereaved parents and 'It's Time to Talk -<br>Child and Baby Funerals', a one day seminar on Wednesday 23 July 2014 at the<br>National Memorial Arboretum. The day will include the official launch of the<br>Child Funeral Charity. [...]
